articles.title: Shares rise, dollar wobbles after market sees Powell comments as dovish - Reuters
articles.description: Shares globally jumped and most currencies rose against the dollar on Wednesday, as investors discerned a dovish tone in comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, though a policy tweak by the ECB meant European bonds sat out the rally.
articles.content: LONDON/SINGAPORE, Feb 8 (Reuters) - Shares globally jumped and most currencies rose against the dollar on Wednesday, as investors discerned a dovish tone in comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, tho… [+3622 chars]
